Package gov.sandia.geotessbuilder

Class BuilderUtils

java.lang.Object
gov.sandia.geotessbuilder.BuilderUtils
public class BuilderUtils
extends java.lang.Object
A collection of static methods that operate on GeoTessModels to modify their structure in various ways. There are methods to:
  • changeAttributes - Downselect the set of attributes supported by the model
  • changeEarthShape - Change the ellipsoid that controls the radial distribution of nodes.
  • combineMajorLayers - Combine multiple layers of type CONSTANT or THIN into a single layer.
  • removeLayer - remove a layer from the model.
  • resampleProfile -
  • checkZeroThicknessLayers -
Author:
sballar

      public static void resampleProfile​(GeoTessModel model, int vertex, int layer, float[] radii) throws java.lang.Exception
      Resample the data at the specified radii.

      Only works on profiles of type NPOINT. All others ignored.

    • combineMajorLayersToConstant

      public static void combineMajorLayersToConstant​(GeoTessModel model, java.lang.String layerName1, java.lang.String layerName2, java.lang.String newLayerName) throws java.lang.Exception
      Combine all the layers between layerName1 and layerName2, inclusive, into a single layer in which the GeoAttributes all have constant values.

      WARNING: this only works with layers comprised of Profiles that are of type CONSTANT or THIN.

      Parameters:
      model -
      layerName1 -
      layerName2 -
      newLayerName -
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception
